documentation.title: KoolComboboxItem Class [Javascript]
documentation.metakeywords: php combobox,php ajax combobox, php combo box,php dropdown list
documentation.metadescription: KoolComboBox extends the capability of combobox to the max.Easy-to-use, highly customized interface, advanced behavior options are the strongest points that make KoolComboBox better than any other industrial similar controls.

method.name: getData
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        //Get the text data of first item in combobox
        var oItem = kac.getItem(kac.getItemIds()[0]);        
        alert(oItem.getData()["text"]);
    }
</script>

method.name: enable
method.shortdesc: Set whether the item is enabled
method.longdesc: Set whether the item is enabled
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        var oItem = kac.getItem(kac.getItemIds()[0]);        
        //Disable the item
        oItem.enable(false);
    }
</script>

method.name: isEnabled
method.shortdesc: Return true if the item is enabled
method.longdesc: Return true if the item is enabled
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        var oItem = kac.getItem(kac.getItemIds()[0]);        
        //Check if the item is disabled
        if(!oItem.isEnabled())
        {
            alert("This item is disabled");
        }		
		
    }
</script>

method.name: isSelected
method.shortdesc: Return true if the item is selected
method.longdesc: Return true if the item is selected
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        var oItem = kcb.getItem(kcb.getItemIds()[0]);        
        //Check if the item is selected
        if(oItem.isSelected())
        {
            alert("This item is selected");
        }		
		
    }
</script>

method.name: setVisible
method.shortdesc: Set the visibility of an item
method.longdesc: Set the visibility of an item
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        //Get the text data of first item in combobox
        //Make the item invisible
        oItem.setVisible(false);
    }
</script>

method.name: select
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        //Select the first item of combobox
        var oItem = kac.getItem(kac.getItemIds()[0]);        
        oItem.select();
    }
</script>

method.name: unselect
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        //UnSelect the first item of combobox if it is selected.
        var oItem = kcb.getItem(kcb.getItemIds()[0]);        
        if(oItem.isSelected())
        {
            oItem.unselect();
        }
    }
</script>
